En geniş anlamı ile, bir fikri yayarak ona taraftar bulma
tekniği olarak tanımlamak mümkündür
Bir başka tanımda; bir amaca hizmet ya da karşı bir amaca zarar
vermek için fikirlerin, olayların, iddiaların amaçlı olarak yayılması
şeklinde tanımlanabilir.
Bir başka tanımda ise
propaganda, ideolojik bir
sistemin (siyasal, sosyal,
ekonomik, dini) taraftar

trans:
It assists in regulating the actions of managers
to facilitate the internal efforts
needed to achieve
organizational objectives.
The core objective of human relations is to shape the image
of a ‘happy and social human’ instead of a ‘mechanical and economic human’.
The objective of public relations is to promote a ‘happy environment.
The core purpose of public relations is to create positive,
harmonious relationships with individuals and organizations, contributing to the unity
of people and society.

In the widest sense, it can be defined as the technique of
promoting an idea to gather followers.
In another definition, it can be described as
the intentional spreading of ideas, events, and claims
to serve a purpose or harm an opposing goal
It is also defined as
a way to attract supporters to an ideological
system (political, social,
economic, religious) by applying
largely forceful tactics to
influence the person's consciousness
